BspUtils_PoolParams Struct Reference

Detailed Description

Create parameters for the fixed size pool.

struct BspUtils_PoolParams

Field Documentation

UInt32 BspUtils_PoolParams::elemSize

Size of each element in bytes.

UInt32* BspUtils_PoolParams::flag

Array of flag variable used by pool manager to indicate whether a pool element is allocated or not. The size of this array should be equal to the number of elements in this pool.

void* BspUtils_PoolParams::mem

Pointer to the pool memory.

UInt32 BspUtils_PoolParams::numElem

Number of elements in the pool.

UInt32 BspUtils_PoolParams::numFreeElem

Count to keep track of the number of free elements in the pool.
